DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine antitumor effect low-dose beta-alethine patient low grade B-cell lymphoma . - Assess effect regimen delayed-type hypersensitivity patient . - Assess safety regimen patient population . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients receive low-dose beta-alethine subcutaneously every 2 week total 6 dos absence unacceptable toxicity . Patients evidence tumor progression may receive additional course therapy . Patients follow 2 week last dose minimum 30 day withdraw due adverse event . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : Approximately 13-37 patient accrue study .
